thread.title: MHY Pavilion Build Underway; Mars National Bank Helps Sponsor Leadership Butler County Project
thread.title_full: MHY Pavilion Build Underway; Mars National Bank Helps Sponsor Leadership Butler County Project - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: MHY Pavilion Build Underway; Mars National Bank Helps Sponsor Leadership Butler County Project
text:
MHY Pavilion Build Underway; Mars National Bank Helps Sponsor Leadership Butler County Project
Mars, PA, September 05, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Mars National Bank is one of many community businesses and organizations supporting the construction of a multi-use pavilion on the campus of MHY Family Services (formerly Mars Home for Youth). The Bank donated $5,000 to the project. As part of the 2015 Class of Leadership Butler County, Ryan Trulick, Vice President Credit Administration, also helped promote the project and worked on several fundraising events.
The groundbreaking for the project was held on July 13, 2015. The Leadership Butler County class and MHY raised over $30,000 for the project to date. An additional $20,000 is needed to finish the project.
“This is a great project for an organization that does terrific work in our community and region,” said Jim Dionise, Mars National Bank President and Chief Executive Officer. “We are proud to support MHY and to have Ryan involved directly through Leadership Butler County.”
Contact MHY for information about the project or to donate funds or volunteer.
Mars National Bank is one true community bank focused on combining the products and technology that its customers need while maintaining its focus on long-term customer relationships.
About Mars National Bank
Mars National Bank is committed to remaining a relationship driven, independent community bank, which offers competitive products and services, made up of dedicated professionals who are passionate about serving our customers in a personal, efficient and friendly manner.
